news.content:
ðŸ“° ThreeFold Weekly! March 14th Edition (Volume Ten)


Last week in ThreeFold: a historic partnership with Paradise Hills in Dubai, tree planting initiatives are underway, some notable community conversations, interesting reads from the blog, addressing a bug with farming rewards, and more.


https://forum.threefold.io/t/threefold-weekly-march-14th-edition-volume-ten/2439
news.excerpt: Key happenings from last week in ThreeFold.

next.title: ThreeFold Tech recognized by Deloitte Belgium
next.excerpt: Congratulations to ThreeFold Tech, which was recognized as one of 10 finalists by Deloitte Belgium in its Rising Star competition! More within.
